## Todoist Template Expander (recursive)
Finds `!! TemplateName` tasks, deletes the placeholder, and clones the matching template (including all subtasks) into the **same project & section** as the placeholder. Creation is serialized with Split In Batches (size 1) so parent/child order is preserved.

parameters.pythonCode:
data = _getWorkflowStaticData('global')
items = list(_input.all())
if not items:
  data['contexts'] = {}
  data['currentPlaceholderKey'] = None
  return []
item = items[0].json
ph = item.get('placeholder')
key = str(item.get('placeholderKey') or (ph or {}).get('id'))
ctxs = data.get('contexts') or {}
ctxs[key] = {
  'placeholder': ph,
  'parentMap': {},
  'remainingCreates': item.get('totalCreateActions', 0),
  'pendingTemplateIds': []
}
# set current key globally so mapper always sees it
data['contexts'] = ctxs
data['currentPlaceholderKey'] = key
return items
